Fitch's Bridge Estates

Summary

0.9 Acres, Trails 0.2 miles, 0.3 km

Prohibited Activities

Motorized use is prohibited

Property Owner

Groton Conservation Commission

Hours

Half an hour past sunrise to half an hour past sunset. Sunrise Time , Sunset Time

Trail Maintenance

Groton Trail Committee. Please email gtc@grotontrails.org to report problems.

Description

Please take personal protection measures to reduce your exposure to ticks and mosquito bites, Please pick up after your dog and do not feed, approach or touch wildlife, including waterfowl.

gtc@grotontrails.org |
